name: 孔繁傑
objective:
本課程主要敘述數位語音訊號的處理技術及語音相關應用。討論的課題主要包括語音分析的基本聲學原理如發音模型與語音特徵分析，以及語音編碼、語音合成、語音辨認等重要應用。
This course is intended to introduce the fundamentals of speech signal processing and related applications. The topics it will address include speech production model, extraction and evaluation of speech features, basic principles of speech analysis and synthesis, speech coding, and speech recognition, etc.
schedule:
Week 1 Course Introduction
Weeks. 2-6 Review of digital signal processing
Weeks 7-10 Speech enhancement introduction
Weeks. 11-12 Speech dereverberation introduction
Week 13-16 Artificial intelligence introduction
Weeks. 17-18 Final presentation
materials:
References:
[1] A. V. Oppenheim and R. W. Schafer, Discrete-Time Signal Processing, 2nd ed. Upper Saddle River, NJ: Prentice Hall, 1999.
[2] S. W. Smith, The Scientist and Engineer's Guide to Digital Signal Processing, 2nd ed. San Diego, CA: California Technical Publishing, 1997.
[3] P. C. Loizou, Speech enhancement: Theory and practice, CRC press, 2007.
[4] P. Kim, MATLAB deep Learning: With machine learning, neural networks and artificial Intelligence, Apress, 2017.
